channel.title: Could sum1 make me a custom command?
channel.description:
i was wondering if sum1 could make me a custom command like ::pkwear so it gives owner admin and mods full skeletal and bone dagger.
if u can it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Could sum1 make me a custom command?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Umm…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkwear”) && playerRights > 0){
addItem (####, #);
addItem (####, #);
sendMessage (“Your message”);
}

That was just from the top of my head, may not work.

Read full topic
item.source: Could sum1 make me a custom command?
